fields.name: complainantSelectionHeader
fields.fieldText:
Please provide details of the complainant.


  1. Select the complainant from the contact list if found and select "Yes - add this contact".
  2. To conduct another name search, click "Previous" to go back.
  3. Select "No - add new contact" to create a new contact record.

fields.name: Add_or_Create_Complainant
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add this contact or create a new contact?

fields.name: subjectSelectionHeader
fields.fieldText:
Please provide details of the subject.


  1. Select the subject from the contact list if found and select "Yes - add this contact".
  2. To conduct another name search, click "Previous" to go back.
  3. Select "No - add new contact" to create a new contact record.

fields.name: Add_or_Create_Subject
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add this contact or create a new contact?

fields.name: complainantSearchHeader
fields.fieldText: Search for the complainant by last name.

fields.name: Enter_Another_Complainant
fields.fieldText: Would you like to enter another complainant?

fields.name: Enter_Another_Subject
fields.fieldText: Would you like to enter another subject?

fields.name: Agency_Not_Found
fields.helpText: Clicking this box will prompt you to create the agency on the next page

fields.name: Subject_Agency_Not_Found
fields.helpText: Clicking this box will prompt you to create the agency on the next page

fields.name: End_Screen_Display
fields.fieldText: Thank you for completing the entry of your cruelty report, #{!Get_New_Cruelty_Report.Name}.

fields.name: Is_subject_known_at_this_time
fields.fieldText: Is subject known at this time?

fields.name: subjectSearchHeader
fields.fieldText: Search for the subject by last name.
